00026 #include <string>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <map>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include "Global.h"
00031 
00032 void GetMtreeFile(std::string filename, int dim, unsigned * hostno, unsigned * hostpop, unsigned * sharedpop, unsigned * subno, unsigned * subpop){
00033   writedebug(DEBUG," * Reading mtree file...");
00034   std::ifstream infile(filename.c_str());
00035   for(int line=0; line<dim; ++line){
00036     infile >> hostno[line];
00037     infile >> hostpop[line];
00038     infile >> sharedpop[line];
00039     infile >> subno[line];
00040     infile >> subpop[line];
00041   }
00042   infile.close();
00043   donedebug(DEBUG);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void WriteMtree2File(std::string filename, int dim, unsigned * hostno, unsigned * hostpop, unsigned * sharedpop, unsigned * subno, unsigned * subpop){
00047   writedebug(DEBUG," * Writing read information back to mtree2...");
00048   std::ofstream outfile((filename+"2").c_str());
00049   for(int line=0; line<dim; ++line){
00050     outfile << hostno[line] << " ";
00051     outfile << hostpop[line] << " ";
00052     outfile << sharedpop[line] << " ";
00053     outfile << subno[line] << " ";
00054     outfile << subpop[line];
00055     outfile << std::endl;
00056   }
00057   outfile.close();
00058   donedebug(DEBUG);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void SubhaloMatch(unsigned isnap){
00062   std::string filename = Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_mtree";
00063   unsigned dim=GetLineNumber(filename);
00064   std::cout<<filename << " has " << dim << " lines." << std::endl;
00065   unsigned hostno[dim], hostpop[dim], sharedpop[dim], subno[dim], subpop[dim];
00066   GetMtreeFile( filename, dim, &hostno[0], &hostpop[0], &sharedpop[0], &subno[0], &subpop[0] );
00067   WriteMtree2File( filename, dim, &hostno[0], &hostpop[0], &sharedpop[0], &subno[0], &subpop[0] );
00068   //for(int line=0; line<dim; ++line)
00069   //    std::cout<<subno[line]<<std::endl;
00070 
00071   //std::cout<<" * Building hostno <=> sharedpop map...";
00072   //std::map<unsigned, unsigned> hsmap;
00073   //for ( unsigned j = 0; j < dim; ++j )
00074   //    hsmap.insert( std::make_pair ( hostno[ j ], sharedpop[ j ] ) );
00075   //std::endl<<"done!"<<std::endl;
00076 
00077   // find number of halos
00078   unsigned count=0;
00079   for(unsigned sh=0; sh<dim; ++sh)
00080     if( hostno[sh] == subno[sh] )
00081       ++count;
00082   std::cout << " * Found " << count << " different halos." << std::endl;
00083   int hosts[count];
00084 
00085 
00086   unsigned shcount = 0;
00087   unsigned sucount = 0;
00088   unsigned hocount = 0;
00089   // run through all subhalos
00090   for( unsigned subhalo = 0; subhalo < dim; ++subhalo ){
00091     if( hostno[subhalo] != subno[subhalo] )
00092       continue;
00093     std::cout << " * * Looking at line " << subhalo << std::endl;
00094     sucount = 0;
00095     hocount = 0;
00096     //count how many times it appears in subno
00097     std::cout << "subhalo = " << hostno[subhalo] << std::endl;
00098     for(unsigned su=0; su<dim; ++su)
00099       if( subno[su] == hostno[subhalo] )
00100     ++sucount;
00101     //count how many times it appears in hostno
00102     for(unsigned ho=0; ho < dim; ++ho)
00103       if( hostno[ho] == hostno[subhalo] )
00104     ++hocount;
00105     // autocorrelation should yield same no. subhalos and host halos
00106     std::cout << "sucount = " << sucount << ", hocount = " << hocount << std::endl;
00107     if(sucount!=hocount)
00108       std::cerr << " * * Found wrong subhalo!" << std::endl;
00109     if(sucount<2){
00110       std::cout << " * * Subhalo occurs only once, it has no host." << std::endl;
00111       hosts[shcount] = -1;
00112       ++shcount;
00113       continue;
00114     }
00115 
00116     std::cout<<" * * Generating array with shared populations...";
00117     unsigned shpop[sucount][2]; // [][0] takes sharepop, [][1] takes hostno
00118     unsigned shpopcount=0;
00119     for( unsigned sc = 0; sc < dim; ++sc){
00120       if(subno[sc] == hostno[subhalo] && subpop[sc]<hostpop[sc]){ // found occurrence
00121     shpop[shpopcount][0] = sharedpop[sc];
00122     shpop[shpopcount][1] = hostno[sc];
00123     std::cout << shpop[shpopcount][1] << " " << shpop[shpopcount][0] << std::endl;
00124     ++shpopcount;
00125       }
00126     }
00127     std::cout << shpopcount << " constituents, done!" << std::endl;
00128     if(shpopcount==0){
00129       hosts[shcount]=-2;
00130       ++shcount;
00131       continue;
00132     }
00133     std::cout<<" * * Getting maximum of shared populations...";
00134     unsigned scmax=0;
00135     for(unsigned sc=0; sc<shpopcount; ++sc){
00136       if(shpop[sc][0]>shpop[scmax][0])
00137     scmax=sc;
00138     }
00139     std::cout<<scmax<<", done!"<<std::endl;
00140         
00141     std::cout<<" * * Getting host corresponding to maximal shared population... ";
00142     hosts[shcount]=shpop[scmax][1];
00143     ++shcount;
00144     std::cout<<hosts[shcount-1]<<", done!"<<std::endl;
00145   }
00146   std::cout << shcount << " subhalos matched."<<std::endl;
00147 
00148   writedebug(DEBUG," * Creating _mtree_idx file...");
00149   std::ofstream fout;
00150   fout.open ( (filename+"_idx2").c_str(), std::ios_base::out );
00151   for(unsigned sc=0; sc<shcount; ++sc){
00152     fout << sc << " "<<hosts[sc] << std::endl;
00153   }
00154   fout.close();
00155   donedebug(DEBUG);
00156 }
